content: Good afternoon Juan, thank you for considering my apartment. As a landlord, I am eager to maximize my gains. I would like to know what you have in mind for the monthly rental price.

content: I would like to rent the apartment for the lowest possible price. I am a student and I want to live on a budget. I am also dependable and responsible, so I am sure I will take good care of the apartment. I understand if you have any concerns or questions.

content: Thank you for your interest in the apartment, Juan. name: Juan Mamani from Bolivia

content: Thank you for your proposal, Juan.
